data.headline: DevOps Engineer with a Passion for Automation
data.summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a strong background in infrastructure automation, cloud deployment, and continuous integration/delivery. Adept at leveraging tools and technologies to streamline workflows and improve operational efficiency.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented infrastructure as code solutions using Terraform to provision and manage cloud resources
Automated deployment pipelines with Jenkins and GitLab CI/CD, ensuring reliable and consistent application deployments
Monitored and optimized cloud infrastructure and application performance using Prometheus and Grafana
Collaborated with development teams to integrate containerization and microservices architecture
Participated in incident response and root cause analysis, implementing process improvements to enhance system reliability

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
bullets: Assisted in the migration of on-premises infrastructure to the AWS cloud
Implemented and maintained Docker-based containerization for development and production environments
Contributed to the automation of build, test, and deployment processes using Jenkins and Ansible
Participated in on-call rotations and provided support for production systems

experience.title: DevOps Intern
bullets: Supported the deployment and scaling of cloud-based infrastructure for startups
Automated the provisioning of development and staging environments using Terraform and Ansible
Participated in the implementation of continuous integration and delivery pipelines
Gained experience in cloud cost optimization and resource allocation

experience.title: Self-Taught DevOps Engineer
bullets: Built and maintained personal infrastructure and applications using cloud services and open-source tools
Experimented with various DevOps practices and methodologies to improve efficiency and reliability
Contributed to open-source projects related to infrastructure automation and monitoring
Actively participated in online communities and forums to expand my knowledge and skills

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal website using React, Node.js, and AWS services to showcase my projects and skills.

projects.name: DevOps Automation Tool
projects.description: Developed an open-source tool to automate the deployment and management of cloud infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible.

interests: Exploring new cloud technologies and DevOps tools
data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Neutral expression, well-lit, cropped to head and shoulders.
